methods.javadoc:
Create a new single loader filter from the given loader class.
@param single The loader class used for this filter.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Create a new single loader filter from the given loader class.

params.name: single
params.comment: The loader class used for this filter.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Create a new single loader filter from the given loader class and loader command line
 argument list.

params.name: single
params.comment: The loader class used for this filter.

params.name: loaderArgs
params.comment:
The loader arguments used for this filter.  Could be null if there
                   are not arguments.

methods.name: getLoaderArgs
methods.comment: Gets the loader arguments tied to the loader in this filter.

return.comment:
The loader arguments tied to the loader in this filter.  Could be null if there
         are no arguments.
